item.title: A Search Engine for Academic Computer VisionÂ Papers
item.description: We built a new search engine for papers published on ICCV and CVPR in recent years, which has been deployed on AWS and can be accessed via this link. Full code is available on our Github.

item.title: All About AUC
item.description: The definition, equivalent form and calculation of AUC.
